tutorial.desc:
Around you is a green valley!
Overgrown lush grass fills the cracks in the stony sidewalk beneath your feet.
It winds ahead of you towards a rickety SIGN barely holding on to life and a collection of wooden buildings.

look.sign1:
Upon inspecting the sign closer, it reads 'Welcome to the ~TOWN~ of Startlandia!'
Huh? It seems like there's some text on the back of the sign! 'Type GO <LOCATION> to travel to another location! Locations are surrounded by ~'s'
Seems simple enough. You fix up the sign so others can understand it and feel accomplished in your reading.
look.caps:
Caps???? CAPS????? YOU WANT TO LOOK AT CAPS?!?!??!?
Well goddamn those letters are capital.
Now beat it, no more looking at caps.

tutorial.desc:
Around you is a green valley!
Overgrown lush grass fills the cracks in the stony sidewalk beneath your feet.
It winds ahead of you towards a rickety SIGN barely holding on to life and a collection of wooden buildings.

look.sign1:
Upon inspecting the sign closer, it reads 'Welcome to the ~TOWN~ of Startlandia!'
Huh? It seems like there's some text on the back of the sign! 'Type GO <LOCATION> to travel to another location! Locations are surrounded by ~'s'
Seems simple enough. You destroy the remains of the sign so that no one else can read it. Should've gotten here first.
look.sign2: The sign is destroyed, but you remember it saying something about a ~TOWN~ and typing GO <LOCATION> to travel there.
look.caps:
Caps???? CAPS????? YOU WANT TO LOOK AT CAPS?!?!??!?
Well goddamn those letters are capital.
Now beat it, no more looking at caps.
